title: LISS panel > Social Integration and Leisure > Wave 10
creator: Joris Mulder (Centerdata)
abstract: This is the tenth wave of the LISS Core Study module called 'Social Integration and Leisure'

parent.title: LISS panel > Social Integration and Leisure

collection_events.minimize_losses: A reminder was twice sent to non-respondents.
collection_events.selection: panel members aged 16 years and older

collection_events.minimize_losses: A reminder was twice sent to non-respondents.

response_overview:
Selected number of household members: 7517 (100.0%)
 Nonresponse: 1288 (17.1%)
 Response: 6229 (82.9%)
 Complete: 6043 (80.4%)
 Incomplete: 186 (2.5%)

questionnaires.name: Social Integration and Leisure, wave 10
questionnaires.description: The survey was administered in Dutch.

questions.name: {intro}
questions.question_text: This questionnaire is about social relations and leisure time.

questions.name: cs001
questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the amount of leisure time that you have?

questions.name: cs002
questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the way in which you spend your leisure time?

questions.name: cs003-cs062
questions.question_text:
We now list a number of organizations that you are free to join. 
Can you indicate, for each of the organizations listed, what applies to you at this moment or has applied to you over the past 12 months? 
(more than one answer possible) 
1 = no connection 
2 = donated money 
3 = participated in an activity 
4 = member 
 5 = performed voluntary work

questions.name: cs063
questions.question_text:
Did you perform any informal care over the past 12 months; that is, did you regularly
help someone in your environment requiring help due to a disease or other affliction?

questions.name: cs064
questions.question_text:
How were you related to this person? 
If you helped more than one person, consider the person that you helped most. 
The person to whom I provided informal care over the past 12 months was my:

questions.name: cs065
questions.question_text:
How were you related to this person? 
The person to whom I provided informal care over the past 12 months was my:

questions.name: cs066
questions.question_text: How many hours of informal care did you provide per week, on average?

questions.name: cs067-cs069
questions.question_text:
What kind of help did you provide? 
(more than one answer possible)

questions.name: cs070
questions.question_text:
Did you personally receive informal care over the past 12 months on account of a disease
or other affliction; that is, did you receive help regularly from someone in your
environment?

questions.name: cs071
questions.question_text:
How were you related to this person? 
If you received help from more than one person, consider the person that helped you
most. 
The person from whom I received informal care over the past 12 months was my:

questions.name: cs072
questions.question_text:
How were you related to this person? 
The person from whom I received informal care over the past 12 months was my:

questions.name: cs073
questions.question_text: How many hours of help did you receive per week, on average?

questions.name: cs074-cs076
questions.question_text:
What kind of help did you receive? 
more than one answer possible

questions.name: cs077
questions.question_text:
Did you perform any other voluntary work over the past 12 months, other than indicated
above?

questions.name: cs078
questions.question_text: What kind of voluntary work did you perform?

questions.name: cs079
questions.question_text:
Considered all together, how much time do you spend on voluntary work and
informal care together per week, on average?

questions.name: cs488-cs493
questions.question_text:
Did you visit any one of the following cultural institutions or performances
over the past 12 months?

questions.name: cs494-cs499
questions.question_text:
How often did you visit these cultural institutions or performances over
the past 12 months?

questions.name: cs102
questions.question_text:
How often did you take a holiday within the Netherlands over the past 12 months? 
We understand a holiday to be a stay (within the Netherlands) away from one’s own
home environment, for relaxation or pleasure, including at least one overnight stay.

questions.name: cs103
questions.question_text:
How often did you take a holiday abroad over the past 12 months? 
We understand a holiday to be a stay (abroad) away from one’s own home environment,
for relaxation or pleasure, including at least one overnight stay.

questions.name: cs104
questions.question_text: Do you practice sports?

questions.name: cs105
questions.question_text: How many hours do you spend on sports per week , on average?

questions.name: cs106-cs122
questions.question_text:
What sport do you practice? 
(more than one answer possible)

questions.name: cs123
questions.question_text: What other sport(s) do you mean?

questions.name: cs124
questions.question_text:
How many days do you watch television per week, on average? 
If you do not watch television, enter a zero (0).

questions.name: cs125-cs126
questions.question_text:
On the days that you watch television, how much time do you spend watching television
per day, on average?

questions.name: cs127
questions.question_text:
How many days do you listen to the radio per week, on average? 
If you do not listen to the radio, enter a zero (0).

questions.name: cs128-cs129
questions.question_text:
On the days that you listen to the radio, how much time do you spend listening to the
radio per day, on average?

questions.name: cs130
questions.question_text:
Did you read one or more books from beginning to end over the past month (30 days),
either for study or for pleasure?

questions.name: cs131
questions.question_text:
How many books did you read from beginning to end
over the past month (30 days), for study or for pleasure?

questions.name: cs132-cs145
questions.question_text:
Did you spend any time on a regular basis on the following matters, over the last 12
months?

questions.name: cs146-cs159
questions.question_text:
And did you spend any time on a regular basis on the following matters, over the last 12
months?

questions.name: cs160-cs186
questions.question_text:
On how many days per week, on average, do you spend time on these matters? 
If less than once per week, enter zero (0).

questions.name: cs187-cs188
questions.question_text:
On the days that you spent time on playing a musical instrument, how much time did you
spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs189-cs190
questions.question_text:
On the days that you spent time on singing/choir/singing group, how much time did you
spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs191-cs192
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on small jobs in and around the house, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs193-cs194
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on model building, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs195-cs196
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on handicrafts, painting, drawing, clay modeling, ceramics, etc., how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs197-cs198
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on photography mentioned below, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs199-cs200
questions.question_text:
On the days that you spent time on 

caring for plants (including garden) or animals, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs201-cs202
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on handwork, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs501-cs502
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on watching blu-ray/DVD/video (including streaming e.g. Netflix, HBO, etc.), how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs205-cs206
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on reading, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs207-cs208
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on collecting stamps, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs209-cs210
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on other collection, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs211-cs212
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on following a course, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs213-cs214
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on drama, musical, ballet, dance, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs215-cs216
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on equestrian sport, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs217-cs218
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on car/motor sport, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs219-cs220
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on mechanical work on car/motorcycle, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs221-cs222
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on card games, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs223-cs224
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on billiards, pool, snooker, darts, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs225-cs226
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on pigeon keeping, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs227-cs228
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on going out, cinema, theatre, dining out, terrace lounging, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs229-cs230
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on cooking, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs231-cs232
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on listening to music, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs233-cs234
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on fishing, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs235-cs236
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on shopping, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs237-cs238
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on dancing, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs239-cs240
questions.question_text: On the days that you spent time on boating, how much time did you spend on this per day, on average?

questions.name: cs444-cs451
questions.question_text:
With which of the following devices do you have access to the internet
at home? More than one answer possible

questions.name: cs505
questions.question_text: Do you sometimes use a computer or laptop , for other things than completing the questionnaires of this panel?

questions.name: cs506
questions.question_text: Do you sometimes use a tablet, for other things than completing the questionnaires of this panel? A tablet is a small flat computer that can be used in your hand.

questions.name: cs507
questions.question_text:
Do you sometimes use a smartphone, for other things than completing the questionnaires of this panel? 
 
A smartphone is a mobile phone with computer facilities.

questions.name: cs242-cs245
questions.question_text: Can you indicate how many hours you use a computer or laptop per week, on average, for other things than completing the questionnaires of this panel? If you do not use a computer at the place indicated, or do not have a computer at the place indicated, enter a zero (0).

questions.name: cs418
questions.question_text: Do you sometimes make use of the Internet on a computer or laptop, for other things than completing the questionnaires of this panel?

questions.name: cs419
questions.question_text: Do you sometimes make use of the Internet on a tablet, for other things than completing the questionnaires of this panel?

questions.name: cs420
questions.question_text: Do you sometimes make use of the Internet on a smartphone, for other things than completing the questionnaires of this panel?

questions.name: cs421-cs424
questions.question_text: Can you indicate how many hours you use the Internet on a computer or laptop per week, on average (including emailing), for other things than completing the questionnaires of this panel? If no hours or if not applicable, enter a zero (0).

questions.name: cs425
questions.question_text: Can you indicate how many hours you use the Internet on a tablet per week, on average (including emailing), for other things than completing the questionnaires of this panel? If no hours or if not applicable, enter a zero (0).

questions.name: cs426
questions.question_text: Can you indicate how many hours you use the Internet on a smartphone per week, on average (including emailing), for other things than completing the questionnaires of this panel? If no hours or if not applicable, enter a zero (0).

questions.name: cs427
questions.question_text: How often do you download apps on your tablet?

questions.name: cs428
questions.question_text: How often do you download apps on your smartphone?

questions.name: cs251-cs266
questions.question_text: Can you indicate whether you ever spend time on the following online activities?

questions.name: cs436
questions.question_text:
How often did you make use of social media
in the past 2 months?

questions.name: cs267-cs282
questions.question_text:
Can you indicate how many hours per week, on average, you spend on these online
activities? 
Add together all activities at work, at home or elsewhere.

questions.name: cs452 - cs470 and cs471
questions.question_text:
Which of the following social media do you use

?

 

 more than one answer possible

questions.name: cs472 - cs474
questions.question_text:
Can you indicate how often you use the following
social networking sites?

questions.name: cs475 - cs477
questions.question_text:
How do you mainly use these social networking
sites?

questions.name: cs512
questions.question_text: To what extent do you have confidence that Facebook respects your privacy?

questions.name: cs513
questions.question_text: To what extent do you have confidence that social media respect your privacy?

questions.name: cs480
questions.question_text:
In general, do you think about what information you
share on social media and about who can see this?

questions.name: cs481
questions.question_text:
You have indicated previously that you do not use social networking
sites (e.g. Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google+, etc.).

 

 Can
you indicate why not?

questions.name: cs482
questions.question_text: Other reason, namely…

questions.name: cs483 - cs485
questions.question_text:
To what extent you agree or disagree with the following statements about
social media (e.g. WhatsApp, Snapchat, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn,
Google+).



 

 1 = completely disagree

 5 = completely agree

questions.name: cs283
questions.question_text:
The following questions are about your social contacts. We understand social contacts in
the following questions to be people you meet in ‘real life’, so not just on
social media. How satisfied are you with your social contacts?

questions.name: cs284-cs289
questions.question_text: To what extent do the following statements apply to you, based on how you are feeling at present?

questions.name: cs290
questions.question_text:
How often do you do the following? 
Spend an evening with family (other than members of your own household)

questions.name: cs291
questions.question_text:
How often do you do the following? 
Spend an evening with someone from the neighborhood

questions.name: cs292
questions.question_text:
How often do you do the following? 
Spend an evening with friends outside your neighborhood

questions.name: cs293
questions.question_text:
How often do you do the following? 
Visit a bar or café

questions.name: cs294 - cs298
questions.question_text:
We would like to concentrate on your closest contacts now, to form a picture of the social
relationships that people have. 
It is easier to answer these types of questions by considering concrete persons.
For that reason, we ask that you list a number of persons close to you. If you wish, you
can enter nicknames or initials, as long as you can remember who they refer to. 
Most people discuss important things with other people.
If you look back on the last six months, with whom did you discuss important things?
Please enter their first names below (to a maximum of 5). 
If with no-one, click on ‘Continue’.

questions.name: cs299
questions.question_text: Are all these people equally dear to you?

questions.name: cs300-cs304
questions.question_text: Which of these people are very dear to you?

questions.name: cs305 - cs314
questions.question_text:
How close are these people to each other? 
1 = very close 
2 = not close, but not total strangers to each other either 
3 = total strangers to each other 
? = I don’t know

questions.name: cs315-cs319
questions.question_text: What is the gender of [these persons…]?

questions.name: cs320/cs331/cs342/cs353/cs364
questions.question_text: The following questions are about [person 1/2/3/4/5]. Of what origin is [person 1/2/3/4/5]?

questions.name: cs321/cs332/cs343/cs354/cs365
questions.question_text: How do you do know [person 1/2/3/4/5]? [He/she] is my...

questions.name: cs322/cs333/cs344/cs355/cs366
questions.question_text: How do you know [person 1/2/3/4/5]? [He/she] is my...

questions.name: cs323/cs334/cs345/cs356/cs367
questions.question_text: How often do you talk to [person 1/2/3/4/5]?

questions.name: cs324/cs335/cs346/cs357/cs368
questions.question_text: How often do you discuss political issues with [person 1/2/3/4/5]?

questions.name: cs325/cs336/cs347/cs358/cs369
questions.question_text: How long have you known [person 1/2/3/4/5]?

questions.name: cs326/cs337/cs348/cs359/cs370
questions.question_text: What is the highest level of education that [person 1/2/3/4/5] completed? If the right educational level is not listed, you can click here to search further.

questions.name: cs327/cs338/cs349/cs360/cs371
questions.question_text: Does [person 1/2/3/4/5] work full-time, part-time, or not at all?

questions.name: cs328/cs339/cs350/cs361/cs372
questions.question_text: What kind of profession does [person 1/2/3/4/5] practice?

questions.name: cs329/cs340/cs351/cs362/cs373
questions.question_text: What age is [person 1/2/3/4/5], approximately?

questions.name: cs330/cs341/cs352/cs363/cs374
questions.question_text: What is the home situation of [person 1/2/3/4/5]?

questions.name: cs410-cs414
questions.question_text:
Note: Please complete the questionnaire fully until you are returned to the initial screen. 
Only then will the system register the questionnaire as fully completed. 
Finally; what did you think of this questionnaire? 
1 = certainly not 
5 = certainly yes

variables.name: cs17j483

When people do not use social media, this is harmful
for the 'real' (non-virtual) social life.
